channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- LinkedIn Company Updates
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- LinkedIn Company Updates

item.title: CVE-2022-2148|2024-08-03T00:24:44.311Z -- unknown -- linkedin%20company%20updates
item.description: The LinkedIn Company Updates WordPress plugin through 1.5.3 does not sanitise and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
